official-title.#text:
Authorizing the use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a ceremony to commemorate the 50th
			 anniversary of the enactment of the Civil Rights Act of 1964.

sponsor.#tail: submitted the following concurrent resolution; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
and the significant impact the Act had on the Civil Rights
			 movement. Physical preparations for the conduct of the ceremony shall be
			 carried out in accordance with such conditions as may be prescribed by the

text.#text:
The rotunda of the United States Capitol is authorized to be used on June 24, 2014, for a ceremony
			 to commemorate the 50th anniversary of the enactment of the

header.#text:
Use of the rotunda of the Capitol for ceremony to commemorate the 50th anniversary of the enactment
			 of the Civil Rights Act of 1964
